title: Uruguay Switched to EVs When Gas Hit $7, Would Americans Do the Same?
description: Uruguay has become an unlikely electric vehicle success story, with EVs now representing about 25% of all new vehicle sales, doubling their market share from last year. The reason? Gasoline now costs around $7.40 per gallon at the pump, making it one of the most expensive places in the world to ...
titleSummary: Uruguay's Electric Vehicle Shift: Can Rising Fuel Prices Trigger a US Revolution?
descriptionSummary: Uruguay has emerged as a surprising leader in electric vehicle adoption, with nearly a quarter of new car sales going to EVs - more than double last year's figure. Gas prices have skyrocketed, hitting over $7 per gallon locally.

title: Mercedes-AMG’s Most Controversial C63 Could Be Gone Sooner Than Expected
description: The controversial four-cylinder Mercedes-AMG C63 S E Performance is reportedly nearing the end of its lifecycle, following a leaked internal memo that surfaced through Germany’s Elektroauto News. According to the outlet, Mercedes is preparing to phase out the four-cylinder C63 and ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes' Hottest Rebel May Get the Axe Ahead of Schedule"
descriptionSummary: Sources close to Mercedes suggest that production of their polarizing four-cylinder C63 S E Performance model may soon come to an end, as the company reportedly prepares a major overhaul of its performance lineup.

title: 2027 Chevy Bolt With Super Cruise Hands-Free System Isn’t So Cheap Anymore
description: Deliveries of the 2027 Chevrolet Bolt will begin early next year, when it will officially be the cheapest EV in the country. Excluding the destination fee, the Bolt will start at $28,595, undercutting the new Nissan Leaf and Chevy’s own Equinox EV. Despite its low price, the Bolt will be available ...
titleSummary: "Bolt Prices Surge: GM Tacks on Cost for Chevy's High-Tech Ride"
descriptionSummary: The 2027 Chevrolet Bolt is set to debut as the most affordable electric vehicle in the US market next year, priced from $28,595 excluding destination fees. This budget-friendly option beats out rivals like the Nissan Leaf and Chevy's Equinox EV.

title: Honda Prelude Battles Muscle Car and Budget Sedan for Car of the Year Crown
description: The 2026 North American Car of the Year (NACTOY) finalists have officially been revealed, and it’s one of the most diverse groups in recent memory. The new Honda Prelude, a sporty hybrid coupe, has been one of the hottest releases of 2025, and has now been named as a finalist. The Honda will face ...
titleSummary: "Midlife Sports Car Takes On Beefy Rivals in Annual Car of the Year Showdown"
descriptionSummary: The finalists for the 2026 North American Car of the Year award have been unveiled, showcasing an incredibly diverse group of contenders. Among them is the highly anticipated Honda Prelude hybrid coupe, a sporty newcomer that's generated significant buzz since its debut in 2025.

title: Hyundai’s 641-HP Ioniq 6 N Is Finally Coming to America — And It’s a Serious Model 3 Performance Threat
description: Hyundai has officially unveiled the Ioniq 6 N at AutoMobility LA, confirming the long-anticipated arrival of its high-performance, Tesla 3 Performance rivaling, electric sedan to North America. After months of teasers and global previews, the 641-horsepower EV will reach the U.S. in limited numbers ...

descriptionSummary: Hyundai has taken the wraps off the Ioniq 6 N at AutoMobility LA, bringing its highly anticipated high-performance electric sedan to North American shores. This potent model boasts 641 horsepower and arrives stateside in a carefully curated initial rollout.

title: Kia Recalls Over 250,000 Sedans For Fire Risk From Melting Gas Tanks
description: Kia has recalled 250,547 sedans for a rather concerning issue that could result in a melting, leaking gas tank, creating a fire risk. The issue relates specifically to the K5 midsize sedan, one of the sportier offerings in the segment. This is not the only fire-related hazard for Kia this year, as ...
titleSummary: Kia Calls Back 250,000 Cars Due to Hazard of Flammable Fuel Leaks
descriptionSummary: Kia has issued a safety alert for 250,547 sedans, citing a potential flaw that could cause the gas tank to overheat and leak fuel, posing a significant fire risk primarily affecting the sporty K5 midsize model.

title: Jeep’s New Military-Inspired Gladiator Goes to War With Tacoma
description: It’s been rather troubling times for Jeep’s midsize pickup, the Gladiator. Despite significant discounts, sales have declined over the last two or so years, while the planned Gladiator hybrid was scrapped before it even reached the market.  But Jeep is forging ahead with a few improvements to ...
titleSummary: "Gladiator Takes Aim at Toyota's Tacominion in Battle of the Off-Road Titans"
descriptionSummary: Jeep's midsize pickup, the Gladiator, has faced a rough patch in recent years. Despite aggressive pricing and promotions, sales have plateaued, and a highly anticipated hybrid model was shelved just before its release. New upgrades are now on the horizon for the struggling truck.

title: 2026 Audi Q3 Arrives $4,000 Pricier—Should You Get a 2025 Model Instead?
description: Audi already revealed the new-generation Q3 in Europe earlier this year, signaling a shift in styling, tech, and performance for its smallest SUV. The U.S. version now arrives for the 2026 model year, and it carries nearly all the same upgrades. The catch is simple: it's pricier. The outgoing 2025 ...
titleSummary: "New Audi Q3 Hits Market at a Higher Price Tag: Is an Older Model the Better Buy?"
descriptionSummary: The latest Audi Q3 has been unveiled in Europe with a bold new design, cutting-edge technology, and enhanced performance capabilities. As it makes its US debut for the 2026 model year, enthusiasts can expect a price tag to match its upgraded features.

title: Volkswagen Restores Miracle T2 Bus That Survived California Wildfires
description: The Palisades fire that ripped through Los Angeles earlier this year was one of the most destructive in history, as thousands of homes were destroyed. But in a Malibu neighborhood, a classic T2 Volkswagen Bus defied the odds by somehow surviving the blaze largely intact, despite all the structures ...
titleSummary: "California's Lucky T2 Bus Emerges from Inferno with Thanks to VW Crew"

title: Meet the GV60 Magma: Genesis’ First Real AMG and M Rival
description: Genesis has been laying the groundwork for its Magma sub-brand for more than a year, positioning it as the performance arm that finally puts the company in the same conversation as BMW M and Mercedes-AMG. While Hyundai N handles the more playful, track-leaning end of the spectrum with its brilliant ...

descriptionSummary: Genesis is poised to shake up the high-performance market with its Magma sub-brand, a bold new direction aimed at rivaling top-tier players like BMW M and Mercedes-AMG. Building on a year-long foundation, Magma promises thrilling performance and prestige credentials.

title: Detroit Three CEOs Face Congress Over Soaring Car Prices

descriptionSummary: Rolls-Royce pushes boundaries with its unique Ghost Gamer edition, a bespoke build inspired by vintage arcade culture. This rare creation meets the exacting standards of its discerning owner, a gaming enthusiast with a passion for retro technology.

descriptionSummary: Nissan's highly anticipated Navara has landed Down Under, boasting a robust new design tailored to tackle Australia's rugged terrain. Engineered locally, this next-generation pickup promises exceptional strength and capability.

title: Base Trim Lucid Gravity Debuts At LA Auto Show With A Friendlier Price Tag
description: Two years after the Lucid Gravity arrived on the Los Angeles Auto Show floor, the long-promised "affordable" version of the all-electric SUV is here. descriptionSummary: After much anticipation, the affordable variant of Lucid's all-electric Gravity SUV has finally arrived. Priced under $80,000, this long-awaited model was unveiled at the 2023 LA Auto Show, marking a significant milestone in the brand's product lineup expansion.

description: The Hyundai Elantra N is one of the more accessible performance cars today. It delivers more-than-decent power and handling chops at a price that keeps it within reach. descriptionSummary: Hyundai's Elantra N offers thrilling performance without breaking the bank, making it an attractive option for driving enthusiasts on a budget. A new TCR Edition has also been introduced in Canada, elevating the model to new heights of style and capability.

title: Hyundai Crater Debuts Looking Ready to Eat Broncos and Wranglers for Breakfast
description: Hyundai has been building out its XRT line for a few years, gradually attaching a harder-edged personality to models like the Ioniq 5, Santa Cruz, and Palisade. descriptionSummary: Hyundai's rugged XRT lineup is gaining traction, with bold designs emerging across models like the Ioniq 5 and Santa Cruz. Its latest iteration, the Hyundai Crater Rock, takes a significant step forward in this direction.

title: 2027 Kia Telluride Debuts With New Turbo Engine and First-Class Seating
description: Revealed earlier this month, Kia has officially debuted the 2027 Telluride at the 2025 Los Angeles Auto Show. While we’ve had a few days to get accustomed to the new look, Kia had not shared the technical specifications of the new crossover until now.  A lot has changed for the ...

descriptionSummary: Kia unveiled its 2027 Telluride at the 2025 Los Angeles Auto Show, giving us our first glimpse of the revamped model. Now that the initial excitement has settled, Kia is sharing the detailed specs and innovations that set this new crossover apart.

title: The 2025 ID. Buzz Is Now One of VW’s Safest Vehicles
description: The 2025 Volkswagen ID. Buzz has secured a 5-Star overall safety rating from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA), giving the electric people-carrier the highest score available under the agency’s New Car Assessment Program. The rating reflects strong ...
titleSummary: Volkswagen's Electric ID. Buzz Surpasses Safety Expectations for Model Year 2025
descriptionSummary: The 2025 Volkswagen ID. Buzz has earned a perfect 5-star safety rating from the NHTSA, the highest honor under its rigorous testing program. This accolade underscores the vehicle's exceptional crashworthiness and safety features.

title: The JDM Honda Odyssey Has Something the US Version Desperately Needs
description: It's no secret that there are two versions of the Honda Odyssey being sold right now. There's the North American version, and there's the one for most Asian markets. It's been that way for nearly 25 years since the second generation was introduced in 1999. Sliding doors are a must for US-market ...
titleSummary: "Honda's Japanese Market Odyssey Offers a Feature American Owners Have Been Missing"
descriptionSummary: The Honda Odyssey has long had a dual identity, with distinct models sold in North America and most Asian countries since its redesign in 1999. A key difference lies in their sliding doors, a feature more prevalent in international markets.

title: Exhaust Specialist Breaks Down Why the Lexus LFA Sounds So Iconic
description: There’s nothing within the automotive realm that can top the exhaust note of a Lexus LFA, unless it’s an early Formula One racecar. descriptionSummary: The Lexus LFA's exhaust note stands unrivaled in the automotive world, with some suggesting an early Formula One car might be its only match. Even the Porsche Carrera GT and Cosworth V12 fall short of capturing this unique sonic experience.

title: 2026 Toyota RAV4 Hybrid Prices Go Up—Should You Get a 2025 Model Instead?
description: The 2026 Toyota RAV4 is close to landing in showrooms, bringing a full redesign and a lineup built entirely around electrification. descriptionSummary: The revamped 2026 Toyota RAV4 is poised to hit dealerships soon, marking a significant shift towards electrification with a range of options, including a standard hybrid and a plug-in variant that render traditional gas-only models obsolete.

title: You May Soon Be Able to Unlock Your Cadillac With Your iPhone or Apple Watch

descriptionSummary: Cadillac owners of certain models may soon enjoy a more seamless experience with their vehicles. Reports indicate that Apple is working on integrating digital car keys into iPhones and Apple Watches, bringing added convenience to luxury brand drivers.

title: 2026 Dodge Durango Gets Cheaper as V6 Returns
description: Little more than three months ago, Dodge was proud to announce that every single version of the Durango three-row SUV came with a V8 engine, with the base model doing away with the older Pentastar V6. The Durango is also the cheapest V8-powered SUV with all-wheel drive in the country. After all the ...
titleSummary: "Durango Drops Price with V6 Engine's Welcome Return to Lineup"
descriptionSummary: Dodge recently made headlines by equipping its entire lineup of three-row Durango SUVs with a robust V8 engine, replacing the older Pentastar V6 in the base model. This move makes the Durango the most affordable V8-powered all-wheel-drive SUV on the market.

title: Nissan Reports Fifth Straight Quarter of Losses Amid Restructuring
description: According to reports by The Wall Street Journal and Bloomberg, Japanese automaker Nissan has announced a fifth straight quarterly net loss as U.S. tariffs proved a major speed bump for the company as it attempts to reorient itself. In an announcement on November 6, Tokyo time, Nissan reported a net ...
titleSummary: "Nissan Slides into Red for Fifth Consecutive Quarter Amid Deep Overhaul"
descriptionSummary: Japanese auto giant Nissan posted its fifth consecutive quarterly loss, hindered by US tariffs that have stymied its efforts to revamp operations and navigate a challenging market landscape, according to recent reports from The Wall Street Journal and Bloomberg.

title: Ford Is Redesigning Dealers to Make Car Buying Feel Easier
description: As someone who has formerly worked in retail spaces, I learned firsthand how the setting in which a particular brand displays its products in its stores could make or break the shopping experience for both buyer and seller. This is the reason you see sales associates and other employees in clothing ...
titleSummary: Ford Overhauls Dealerships to Simplify and Streamline the Car-Buying Experience
descriptionSummary: Retail environments have a profound impact on consumer engagement and employee satisfaction. As someone with retail experience, I've witnessed firsthand how store layouts can either delight customers or hinder sales, affecting relationships between buyers and sellers.

description: A 2026 Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 3LZ has flipped for a massive profit after the original buyer purchased it for $220,745, trailered it home, never drove it, and later sold it for $290,000. The car, delivered in factory-fresh condition with just 5 miles showing, was immediately ...
titleSummary: "Corvette Enthusiast Scores Big with Rare 2026 ZR1 Sale for $70,000 Profit"
descriptionSummary: A rare 2026 Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 3LZ recently changed hands at a substantial gain after its original owner bought it new for nearly $220,750, drove it only briefly before selling it for a whopping $290,000 just a short time later.

title: Tesla Quietly Cut 400 Pounds From the New Model X — Here’s How
description: Due to regulations, safety systems, and the demand for more features, cars have gained a lot of weight dramatically. titleSummary: Tesla Trims 400 Kilos From Luxe SUV, Rebooting It for Weightless Performance
descriptionSummary: Over the past few decades, vehicles have significantly expanded in size and heft due to stricter safety regulations, increased feature demands, and the integration of hybrid technology, often resulting in weights exceeding 4,000 pounds.

title: Hyundai’s New $7,500 Carbon Fiber Kit Makes the Ioniq 6 N Even Wilder
description: Hyundai has unveiled a $7,500 carbon-fibre performance kit for the Ioniq 6 N, giving owners a factory-backed way to push the high-performance EV’s aerodynamics and handling even further. The package includes new carbon-fibre splitters, skirts and a rear diffuser, plus a double-deck rear ...

descriptionSummary: Hyundai's latest accessory for the Ioniq 6 N is a premium carbon fibre upgrade package worth $7,500. This official enhancement bolsters the EV's aerodynamics and handling capabilities with sleek new components, including a rear diffuser and dual-tiered spoiler.

Both SV trims—the normal one and the SV Black—cost comfortably north of $200,000, and for many, they’ll be more than enough luxury SUV. But Overfinch, the British ...

descriptionSummary: At the pinnacle of Land Rover's lineup is the Range Rover SV, a luxurious and rugged off-road icon that seamlessly blends high-end refinement with unbridled capability. Its premium price tag - over $200,000 - reflects its unparalleled opulence.

descriptionSummary: Mazda's stylish MX-5 gets an upgrade with the help of Scud Power, a Japanese company that offers a sleek long-nose conversion kit, transforming the car's distinctive front end for a fresh new look.

title: Volvo EX90 Owners Can Now Use Their SUV to Power Their Homes
description: Volvo EX90 owners in the United States can now use their electric SUV as a vehicle-to-home (V2H) power source, thanks to new bi-directional charging support integrated with the dcbel Ara Home Energy Station. The system allows the EX90’s battery to send power back into a home’s electrical ...

descriptionSummary: Volvo EX90 drivers in the US can now harness their electric SUV's potential as an on-demand power source, thanks to the integration of bi-directional charging capabilities with the dcbel Ara Home Energy Station. This innovative system enables seamless energy transfer between vehicle and home.

title: Volkswagen Sued Over Claims Haptic Controls Cause Unintended Acceleration
description: Over the last couple of years, several automakers have declared war on the good ol' button. We're seeing more cars with basic functions being moved to the touchscreen, along with smooth haptic controls on the steering wheel and other control panels. Some continue to insist on moving to a glass ...
titleSummary: "VW Faces Lawsuit Alleging Faulty Pedal Response in Certain Models"
descriptionSummary: Car manufacturers are phasing out traditional buttons in favor of intuitive touchscreens and tactile steering wheel controls, transforming the driving experience through seamless integration of technology and design.

titleSummary: "Tesla Owners Get Long-Awaited Upgrade with New High-Tech Steering Wheel Buttons"
descriptionSummary: Tesla's innovative approach has elevated the art of minimalism in car design, substituting traditional buttons with a prominent touchscreen display. title: Toyota is Spending $912 Million to Keep Building its Hybrids in the U.S.

descriptionSummary: Toyota has committed to investing $912 million in upgrades at five US factories, marking the latest milestone in its pledge to spend up to $10 billion in the country over the next half decade.

title: Hyundai’s Working on EV Charging So Fast You’ll Forget It’s Not Gas

The target, according to Tyrone Johnson, Managing Director of the Hyundai Motor Europe Technical Center (HMETC), is to get EV charging to a stage where it feels as quick and ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai's Lightning-Fast Electric Refuelers Could Make Plug-In Driving as Smooth as Gas"
descriptionSummary: To win over mass market adopters, Hyundai is focusing on alleviating range anxiety by streamlining electric vehicle charging. According to Tyrone Johnson, the company aims to make recharging feel as effortless and speedy as filling up a gas tank.

title: Is the Honda Prelude Worth Its Premium Price Tag?
description: Good news: the circa $43,000 price tag prematurely published by dealers wasn't a markup. Bad news: it's the real thing.
